title: Calories in the McRib
meta_description: Discover calories in the McRib from McDonald's, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for your meal planning.
assumptions: Standard McDonald's McRib sandwich: pork patty, BBQ sauce, pickles, onions on a bun; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, portion size, ingredients, and preparation. Check McDonald's app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One McRib sandwich contains about 480 calories and 24 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add one slice of American cheese

faqs.q: How many calories in the McRib?
faqs.a: Approximately 480 calories per standard McRib sandwich.

faqs.q: What is the protein in a McRib?
faqs.a: About 24 g of protein per sandwich.

faqs.q: Does the McRib have trans fats?
faqs.a: Yes, around 0.5 g of trans fat per sandwich.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in the McRib?
faqs.a: Roughly 850 mg of sodium, mostly from the sauce and bun.

faqs.q: Are McRib calories the same everywhere?
faqs.a: Values can vary slightly by country or recipe changes; verify locally.
